item.title: Manifesto
item.description:
“The Industrial Revolution and its consequences have been a disaster for the human race.”

The quadratic formula is:

int main(){
 cout<<test"al";
}
$$ E = mc^2 $$
import os
print("Anarchy rules")
\[ \begin{aligned} KL(\hat{y} || y) &= \sum_{c=1}^{M}\hat{y}_c \log{\frac{\hat{y}_c}{y_c}} \\ JS(\hat{y} || y) &= \frac{1}{2}(KL(y||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2}) + KL(\hat{y}||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2})) \end{aligned} \]

Everyone should have a website where they can show their inner anarchy free of censorship and run it on-prem.
